name: A Quest Too Far
storyline:
You have beaten the Dungeons of Doom.  You have
saved kingdoms, slain dragons and fought evil -
a true hero.  But that was all a long time ago.

Now you're an old man with a family.  Your adventuring
days are over ... or so you thought.  One day you wake
up to find your family distraught as your grandchildren
are missing.

Taking some of your old equipment, you follow their
tracks into the forest.  After many miles you reach the
entrance to a cave.
summary: A Quest Too Far is a roguelike game (7 day roguelike) where you play a veteran adventurer, fighting to overcome monsters despite his age and poor health.
